content: marina is a breezy striped tee that s simple to crochet and versatile to style worked flat in pieces from the bottom up and seamed marina is crocheted in berroco seaspun this recycled yarn offers great drape a smooth feel and makes something beautiful from plastic cleared from the ocean **finished measurements** bust 35 39½ 43½ 48 52½ 56½ 61 65 69½ / 89 100 5 110 5 122 133 5 143 5 155 165 176 5 cm length 19½ 20 20½ 20½ 21 21 21½ 22 22 / 49 5 51 52 52 53 5 53 5 54 5 56 56 cm shown in size 39½ / 100 5 cm recommended ease approximately 2 4 / 5 10 cm positive ease **yarn** berroco seaspun 1 50 grs 3 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 balls #10306 drop off c1 and 3 3 4 4 5 5 5 6 6 balls #10301 shell c2 **hooks and notions** crochet hook size h / 5 mm *or size to obtain gauge* removable markers **gauge** 15 double_crochet and 8 row = 4 / 10 cm in double_crochet *gauge is measured after blocking to save time and ensure accurate measurements take time to check gauge * 1 https //berroco com/yarns/berroco-seaspun
